nodes.text: The Rights of Sentience League was an organization affiliated with the Galactic Republic. In 33 BBY it participated in the Eriadu Trade Summit, an event held on the planet of Eriadu intended as a forum for the Galactic Republic and the Trade Federation to discuss the taxation of outlying trade zones. During the trade summit, a mixed-species group representing the League waited to be admitted at the east entrance of the event's location at Seswenna Hall in Eriadu City.
The Rights of Sentience League briefly appeared in the 2001 novel Cloak of Deception, written by James Luceno.
